HomePage.subtitle: Your guide to public transportation in Kuala Lumpur

about.title: About This Project
about.description: KL Transit is an open-source project aimed at making public transportation in Kuala Lumpur more accessible. It provides easy access to bus routes, stops, and service information.

recentRoutes.title: Recently Viewed Routes
recentRoutes.description: View your recently viewed routes here

meta.title: KL Transit - KL Public Transport Guide
meta.description: Your comprehensive guide to public transportation in Kuala Lumpur. Find bus routes, stops, and service information easily.

trips.title: Trips
trips.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this trip?
